data.name: allnex
data.description: allnex is a specialty chemicals pioneer and a leading producer of coating resins and additives for architectural, industrial, protective, automotive and special purpose coatings and inks. We serve our customers with a global footprint that provides a reliable supply of resins and additives, responsive local customer support and a track record of innovation. We believe strongly in working safely and protecting the environment by using energy more efficiently, increasing the amount of renewable and recycled content in our products and reducing waste.

data.name: EBECRYL
data.description: 100% solids UV curable resins monomers and oligomers, including a wide range of urethane acrylates, polyester acrylates, amino acrylates and epoxy acrylates.

data.name: CYMEL
data.description:
CYMEL® amino crosslinkers have been used for over 50 years in metal, wood and rubber coating applications, including automotive OEM, kitchen cabinets, metal food and beverage packaging, metal building products, tire and general metal finishing. 
The crosslinkers are used with epoxy, polyester, acrylic and alkyd resins and provide the desired balance of flexibility, exterior durability, chemical resistance and film toughness. Our new CYMEL® NF formaldehyde-free crosslinkers are ideal for applications where formaldehyde emissions are a concern. 
The CYMEL® amino resin crosslinker line includes:

Methylated and butylated melamines
Alkylated and imino mixed ether melamines
Alkylated ureas
Formaldehyde-free modified ureas
Benzoguanamine
Glycoluril

data.name: BECKOPOX
data.description: Waterborne epoxy dispersion and epoxy hardener for lower-VOC, high-performance anticorrosion industrial and construction coatings

data.name: PHENODUR
data.description:
PHENODUR® phenolic resins mainly find use in industrial and packaging coatings, in combination with other types of resins, such as epoxies, acrylics and polyesters.
PHENODUR®specially formulated solvent-based and waterborne resins are designed for use in coatings applied to the interior of metal food containers, and include phenolic resin systems that can be used to make Bisphenol A- and BADGE-free interior can coatings.

data.name: ADDITOL
data.description: Coating additives help formulators optimize paint processing, appearance, application and stability.

data.name: CYCAT
data.description: This catalyst portfolio encompasses a portfolio of weak acid, strong acid and block catalyst materials designed to work with specific amino resin types and coating systems. Catalysts to speed up cross linking reactions of amino or phenolic resin cured stoving enamels or two-component polyurethane systems.

data.name: ADDITOL® XL 255 N
data.description: ADDITOL® XL 255 N, a proficient dispersant and wetting agent, elevates coatings in solvent-borne, solventless, and high-solids formulations. ADDITOL® XL 255 N proudly claims to be APEO-free, bio-based, and tin-free. Its special properties include reducing flocculation with common organic and inorganic pigments, enhancing color strength and gloss in air drying, and stoving paint systems. With its effective wetting and dispersing capabilities, ADDITOL® XL 255 N not only shortens pigment grinding time but also prevents the settling of pigments and extenders.

data.name: MODAFLOW® 2100
data.description: MODAFLOW® 2100 is a clear to light yellow coating primarily designed for the automotive, transportation, and paints and coatings sectors. It finds extensive applications in automotive OEM coatings, marine coatings, vehicle refinishing, and building and construction wood finishes. The product's versatility extends to various printing and packaging segments, including flexography, gravure printing, inkjet printing, offset, and lithographic printing. Additionally, it offers compatibility with substrates like metal and wood, and its cure method involves radiation.

data.name: ADDITOL® VXL 4950
data.description: ADDITOL® VXL 4950 is a specialized adhesion-promoting primer formulated for plastics, specifically designed for application as a pre-treatment primer. It is crucial to note that ADDITOL® VXL 4950 is not intended for use as an additive in paints. With a focus on marine coatings, this primer enhances adhesion when applied before the coating process. Its application methods include brush, roller, and spray, ensuring versatility in different coating scenarios. The appearance of ADDITOL® VXL 4950 is clear, contributing to its suitability for various plastic substrates in marine coating applications.

data.name: MODAFLOW® 9200
data.description: MODAFLOW® 9200 is an APEO-free, tin-free, and VOC-free clearcoat technology suitable for various markets, including automotive and transportation, paints and coatings, as well as printing and packaging. It finds applications in automotive OEM coatings, marine coatings, vehicle refinish, wood coatings and finishes, coil coatings, industrial coatings, metal coatings, packaging coatings, and printing inks such as flexography, gravure, inkjet, lithographic, and screen printing. This radiation-curable coating is compatible with metal and wood substrates, presenting a clear appearance and utilizing radiation cure as its cure method.

data.name: SETAQUA® PU F125
data.description: SETAQUA® PU F125 is intended for 1K (1 component) aqueous coatings and is especially suited for use in roofing and building envelope applications in the building and construction sector. Perfect for wood substrate insulation projects and Exterior Insulation and Finish Systems (EIFS). This clear liquid coating is a dependable solution for wood surfaces, blending invisibly with waterborne compositions. Its wood-compatibility guarantees a reliable and effective application procedure.

data.name: MODAFLOW® RESIN
data.description: MODAFLOW® RESIN is an acrylic flow modifier specifically formulated without the addition of silicone. It finds application in non-aqueous industrial coatings and powder coatings, where its primary functions include enhancing flow and leveling, reducing issues like pinholes, fisheyes, craters, and orange peel. This product contributes to improved substrate wetting and helps maintain or enhance substrate adhesion. Additionally, MODAFLOW® RESIN serves as a defoaming agent, aids in air release, and facilitates pigment dispersion. It is employed in various coating applications such as top coats, powder coatings, radiation-curable coatings, clearcoats, screen printing inks, inkjet inks, varnishes, flexography inks, solventborne coatings, gravure inks, and lithographic inks. Notably, it adheres to labeling claims of being VOC-free, APEO-free, and Tin-free.

data.name: BECKOPOX™ EH 694
data.description: BECKOPOX™ EH 694, categorized under CASE Ingredients additives, functions as a hardening agent from the anhydride chemical family. Notably VOC-free, it offers enhanced heat and chemical resistance. Designed for diverse coating applications, including industrial, furniture, metal, and specialty coatings, it's compatible with epoxies and hybrid systems. Available in granules, liquids, and solid forms, it caters to epoxy, hybrid, and powder coating formulations.

data.name: EBECRYL® 303
data.description: EBECRYL® 303, crafted by CASE Ingredients, is a cutting-edge product tailored for paints and coatings and the printing and packaging sectors. Notably Bisphenol A-free and boasting a low carbon footprint, this solvent-free and VOC-free liquid is optimized for applications like film and foil coatings and overprint varnishes. Its versatility shines in printing techniques such as flexography, gravure, inkjet, and screen printing, especially on plastic substrates. With efficient curtain and gravure coating methods, it ensures rapid radiation curing, delivering a clear and impeccable finish.

data.name: CYCAT® 4045 Catalyst
data.description: CYCAT® 4045 Catalyst, categorized under CASE Ingredients' additives, is specifically formulated to cater to the demands of the automotive, transportation, and marine coatings sectors. Offered in a clear liquid state, this catalyst is designed to seamlessly integrate with metal substrates, ensuring an efficient and effective application process.

data.seo_description: allnex is a specialty chemicals pioneer and a leading producer of coating resins and additives for architectural, industrial, protective, automotive and special purpose coatings and inks. We serve our

data.name: ADDITOL® VXW 6210 N Technical Data Sheet (EN)

data.heading: The global leader in industrial coating resins.

data.name: BECKOPOX
data.html_description: Waterborne epoxy dispersion and epoxy hardener for lower-VOC, high-performance anticorrosion industrial and construction coatings
data.text_description: Waterborne epoxy dispersion and epoxy hardener for lower-VOC, high-performance anticorrosion industrial and construction coatings
data.seo_title: BECKOPOX - allnex - Epoxy Dispersion - Epoxy Hardener - Knowde
data.seo_description: View all allnex BECKOPOX products on Knowde.com. Quickly and easily request a quote, get samples, and download data sheets.

data.name: BECKOPOX™ EH 694
data.description: BECKOPOX™ EH 694, categorized under CASE Ingredients additives, functions as a hardening agent from the anhydride chemical family. Notably VOC-free, it offers enhanced heat and chemical resistance. Designed for diverse coating applications, including industrial, furniture, metal, and specialty coatings, it's compatible with epoxies and hybrid systems. Available in granules, liquids, and solid forms, it caters to epoxy, hybrid, and powder coating formulations.

data.name: BECKOPOX™ EP 384W/53WAMP
data.description: BECKOPOX™ EP 384W/53WAMP is an epoxy- and epoxy derivative-based binder and resin by CASE Ingredients. Tailored for diverse markets such as automotive and transportation and paints and coatings, it offers corrosion resistance and enhanced chemical resistance. This liquid dispersion, known for its multi-substrate adhesion, is suitable for various applications, including automotive OEM coatings, marine coatings, and industrial coatings on metal surfaces.

data.name: BECKOPOX™ EM 2120w/45WA
data.description: BECKOPOX™ EM 2120w/45WA is a dispersion and liquid within the epoxy and epoxy derivatives chemical family, functioning as a binder, resin, and corrosion inhibitor under CASE Ingredients. Targeting automotive and transportation, paints and coatings, and building and construction sectors, it stands out with APEO-free, formaldehyde-free, and VOC-free labeling. This product offers corrosion resistance, a balanced set of properties, low flash rust, and matting features. Suitable for 1K coatings, epoxy coatings, primers, and waterborne coatings, it is compatible with epoxies and adheres well to metal and wood substrates.

data.name: BECKOPOX™ EH 606
data.description: BECKOPOX™ EH 606, an aliphatic polyamine adduct, serves as a low-viscosity hardener compatible with liquid, solvent-free epoxy resins. Specifically designed for solvent-borne coatings, it finds application in marine coatings. This hardener, in liquid form, contributes to the formulation of durable and high-quality coatings.

data.name: BECKOPOX™ EP 117
data.description: BECKOPOX™ EP 117 is a liquid binder and resin categorized within the epoxy and epoxy derivatives family by CASE Ingredients. Tailored for the building and construction and paints and coatings sectors, it boasts solvent-free and VOC-free labeling. The product is distinguished by its enhanced chemical and mechanical resistance and is particularly suited for floor coatings in both industrial and metal coating applications.

data.name: BECKOPOX™ VEM 2448/50EEP
data.description: BECKOPOX™ VEM 2448/50EEP is a self-crosslinking, modified, carboxylated epoxy resin serving as the exclusive binder in can-coating systems for both interior and exterior applications. It is particularly well-suited for white and clear coatings, including stamping enamels, capsule lacquers, foil lacquers, and coil-coating primers. This resin excels at providing outstanding resistance. Its versatility extends to epoxy coatings, solvent-borne coatings, and primers. Widely applicable, it finds use in marine coatings, vehicle refinish, and other packaging coatings.

data.name: BECKOPOX™ EP 2384W/57WA
data.description: BECKOPOX™ EP 2384W/57WA is a dispersion and liquid binder and resin classified under the epoxy and epoxy derivatives family by CASE Ingredients. Notably benzyl alcohol-free, solvent-free, tin-free, and VOC-free, it offers a good balance of properties with features like high film thickness, low odor, matting, multi-substrate adhesion, and reduced surface preparation. Catering to automotive and transportation and paints and coatings sectors, it finds applications in automotive OEM coatings, marine coatings, vehicle refinish, decorative paints, industrial coatings, and metal coatings. This product, compatible with epoxies, is formulated as both epoxy and waterborne coatings suitable for various substrates, particularly metal.

data.name: BECKOPOX™ EH 624
data.description: BECKOPOX™ EH 624 serves as a liquid catalyst within the CASE Ingredients framework. Tailored for the building and construction and paints and coatings sectors, its applications encompass decorative paints and finishes, primarily solventborne coatings. This product features a free-phenol content of less than 5%, facilitating curing at temperatures as low as 5°C. It excels at providing good chemical resistance and acts as an accelerator for low-reactive hardeners in coatings, adhesives, and laminates.

data.name: BECKOPOX™ EP 075
data.description: BECKOPOX™ EP 075 serves as a flexibilizing bifunctional reactive diluent with a neutral odor, specifically designed for unmodified epoxy resins. It functions as both an active diluent and a rheology modifier. Tailored for applications in furniture coatings, it is well-suited for 2K (2-component) and solventborne coatings. This product is compatible with metal substrates, providing versatility in various coating processes.

data.name: BECKOPOX™ EP 116
data.description: BECKOPOX™ EP 116 is a non-crystallizing liquid resin, tailored for coatings demanding high chemical resistance, as well as adhesives, trowelling, casting, and laminating compounds. Ideal for epoxy coatings, laminates, and solventless or high-solids coatings on metal surfaces, it offers improved chemical resistance and good abrasion resistance. Versatile applications span exterior and interior use, including wallcoverings, decorative laminates, furniture coatings, industrial coatings, and metal coatings. This resin stands out for its adaptability and durability across a spectrum of demanding applications.

data.name: BECKOPOX™ EP 387W/52WA
data.description: BECKOPOX™ EP 387W/52WA is an epoxy and epoxy derivative binder and resin by CASE Ingredients, labeled benzyl alcohol-free and VOC-free. Noted for its corrosion resistance, improved flexibility, and matte gloss capability, it serves the building and construction and paints and coatings sectors. Applications encompass decorative paints, EIFS, insulation, and industrial coatings on both metal and plastic substrates.

data.name: BECKOPOX™ VEH 2177W/80WA
data.description: BECKOPOX™ VEH 2177W/80WA, an amine-based hardening agent by CASE Ingredients, is formaldehyde-free and VOC-free. Recognized for its corrosion resistance and improved water immersion, it targets the automotive and transportation and paints and coatings sectors, specifically automotive OEM and marine coatings on metal substrates using waterborne technology.

WHY_CHEMISTRY.HEADING: Driving the world's most impactful industry forward.

SECTION_1.DESCRIPTION: At Knowde, we believe in the power of chemistry. We believe that easy and efficient access to information and raw materials enables you to work smarter and faster so you can continue to make a rich global impact.

SECTION_2.DESCRIPTION: Your innovations have decreased the carbon footprint of the automotive industry, imagined a sustainable agricultural future, developed alternative, biodegradable packaging materials, and changed the landscape of connectivity forever – to name a few. This is only the beginning.
SECTION_2.HEADING: We can't wait to see what you create with Knowde.

TOOLTIP.TITLE: Why is this important?
TOOLTIP.PARAGRAPH_I: Knowde is a B2B platform where customers and suppliers conduct business online. Using a business email address demonstrates the legitimacy of your company and commercial intent, and you are much more likely to receive responses to your requests.
TOOLTIP.PARAGRAPH_II: You can still use a personal email but you may have additional company verification steps before getting access to all of {companyName}'s features.

FLAVOR_ANALYZER.HEADER: Need a flavor that’s not in our online PRIMETIME catalog?
FLAVOR_ANALYZER.DISCOVER_FLAVORS: Tap into our expansive offline portfolio of over 500,000 flavors! Our Portfolio Team can assist in identifying the perfect flavor for your needs. Tell us more about what you’re looking for.

PAYWALL.TITLE_1: Get new products to market faster with a free Knowde Marketplace account
PAYWALL.DESCRIPTION_1: Gain instant access to our marketplace of over 250,000 chemicals, ingredients and polymers from 8,000 suppliers. Browse, search, and filter to quickly compare products, find information, request documents, order samples, and get quotes directly from suppliers.
PAYWALL.TITLE_2: The fastest way to find the right raw materials for your products
PAYWALL.DESCRIPTION_2: Search and filter over 250,000 chemicals, ingredients and polymers, access documents and download starter formulations. Interact with over 8,000 suppliers whose representatives are ready to help. Sign up for a free Knowde Marketplace account today.
PAYWALL.DESCRIPTION_3: Create a free account to gain instant access to our marketplace of over 250,000 products and their documents.
